targets.rawSql: SELECT soc_percent as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT CONCAT(FLOOR(remain_time_min / 60), 'h ', MOD(remain_time_min, 60), 'm') as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'bmsMaster.temp')::numeric / 10.0, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'inv.outTemp')::numeric / 10.0, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT watts_in_sum as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT watts_out_sum as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'mppt.inWatts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'inv.outputWatts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'inv.inputWatts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'pd.carWatts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'pd.typec1Watts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'pd.typec2Watts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'pd.usb1Watts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'pd.usb2Watts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE((raw_data->>'pd.qcUsb1Watts')::numeric, 0) as value FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  soc_percent AS value,
  'Battery SOC' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
ORDER BY ts ASC

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  remain_time_min / 60.0 AS value,
  'Runtime (hours)' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND remain_time_min IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts ASC

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  watts_in_sum AS value,
  'Input' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
UNION ALL
SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  watts_out_sum AS value,
  'Output' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  (watts_in_sum - watts_out_sum) AS value,
  'Net Power' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
ORDER BY ts ASC

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  COALESCE((raw_data->>'mppt.inWatts')::numeric, 0) AS value,
  'Solar' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND raw_data IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts ASC

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  COALESCE((raw_data->>'inv.inputWatts')::numeric, 0) AS value,
  'AC Input' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND raw_data IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  COALESCE((raw_data->>'inv.outputWatts')::numeric, 0) AS value,
  'AC Output' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND raw_data IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  COALESCE((raw_data->>'bmsMaster.temp')::numeric / 10.0, 0) AS value,
  'Battery (BMS)' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND raw_data IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  COALESCE((raw_data->>'inv.outTemp')::numeric / 10.0, 0) AS value,
  'Inverter' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND raw_data IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  COALESCE((raw_data->>'mppt.mpptTemp')::numeric / 10.0, 0) AS value,
  'MPPT' AS metric
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts >= $__timeFrom()::timestamptz
  AND ts <= $__timeTo()::timestamptz
  AND raw_data IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT device_sn FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn != '' ORDER BY device_sn
list.name: device_sn
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT device_sn FROM ecoflow_measurements WHERE device_sn != '' ORDER BY device_sn
